name: about
contents: ## about I'm currently a student at Brigham Young University studying bioinformatics. While my research experience at BYU has been largely been in ecology and hydrology, I have recently become more interested in pursuing biomedical and genetic research. I'm proficient in Python, R, Bash, C++, SQL, MongoDB/NoSQL, Git version control, Javascript, Vue.js, Node.js, HTML/CSS, data visualization, Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop, Aftereffects, & Russian. I enjoy hiking, art, music, photography, climbing, gardening, reading, ice skating, book-binding, & cooking.
